                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Add a file as a Yarn LocalResource.
        Parameters:
        fs - a FileSystem instance
        destFilePath - the destination file path
        resourceType - the LocalResourceType of the file
        resourceMap - a Map of file names to their corresponding LocalResources
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there's something wrong adding the file as a LocalResource
